ch.unibas.bsc.detapp.connection

Class BluetoothManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.unibas.bsc.detapp.connection.BluetoothManager

  • public class BluetoothManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which holds and manages a Bluetooth Low Energy GATT connection.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static BluetoothManager getInstance()
        In case the BluetoothManager is called for the first time, you need to pass a scanner object. Otherwise it will return the already created instance of BluetoothManager.
        Returns:
        instance of BluetoothLeScanner
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - in case it wasn't initialized already we need a BluetoothScanner object. Use the overloaded getInstance(BluetoothLeScanner scanner) method

      • getInstance

        public static BluetoothManager getInstance(android.bluetooth.le.BluetoothLeScanner scanner,
                                           android.content.SharedPreferences preferences)
        In cas the BluetoothManager is called for the first time, you need to pass a scanner object. Otherwise it will return the already created instance of BluetoothManager.
        Parameters:
        scanner - BluetoothLeScanner to enable scanning
        Returns:
        instance of BluetoothLeScanner

      • scanForDevice

        public void scanForDevice(boolean enable)
        Scans for BLE devices
        Parameters:
        enable - boolean which can start or stop a BLE device scan

      • subscribeToCharacteristic

        public void subscribeToCharacteristic()
        Iterate through gatt services and subscribe (reading and enable notifications) to characteristics
